episodes.synopsis: Max and Sally take on Boula the Alien and Miro the Crab and help Lapinou and his little brothers! / Max and Sally take on Broccoli and Whale.
episodes.title: Bunny Wabbit Baby-sits His Brothers / Zozo's Gift to Zuliet / Boula Goes Back to His Planet / Django Looks for His Trumpet / Tino and Toni Want to Go to the Ball / Marvin Makes a Pie

episodes.synopsis: Max and Sally take on Django the Tree Frog and Broccoli and help Fifi the Goldfish get his ideas straight! / Max and Sally take on the Daisy sisters.
episodes.title: Fifi Has the Memory of a Goldfish / Weela's Merry-Go-Round / Sir Rooster and His Broken Alarm Clock / Sir Rooster Cooks for His Family / Roger Needs Help with Boula's Birthday / Broccoli and the Panda

episodes.synopsis: Max and Sally take on Whale and Lapinou and help the Ant sisters get ready for bed! / Max and Sally take on Carabouille and the Pink Octopus.
episodes.title: Time for Bed, Ant Sisters! / Bobino and Princess Hippo's Dress / Mr. Wolf's Opera / Gaston the Cosmonaut / Archibald and the Ladybugs / Zozo Has to Wake Up

episodes.synopsis: Max and Sally take on the Leek twins. / Max and Sally take on Bobino the Hedgehog and Django the Tree Frog and help Carlo make a tart.
episodes.title: Zoe and Zelie Go to a Concert / Marvin and the Strawberry Festival / Jo Freeze, Ski Champion / Pink Octopus, the Tennis Star / Broccoli's Portrait / Princess Hippo Plays Soccer

episodes.synopsis: Max and Sally take on Fifi the Goldfish and Princess Hippo. / Max and Sally take on Fifi the Goldfish and Jo Glagla and help Whale prepare for a show!
episodes.title: Django and the Drawing / Whale's Dance Show / Nestor Goes to Town / Captain Plush and the Treasure / Wi-Bot's Jelly / Roger's Bright Smile

episodes.synopsis: Max and Sally take on Gaston and Messire the Rooster. / Max and Sally take on Miro the Crab and Bobino the Hedgehog and help Princess Hippo stay fit!
episodes.title: Weela and Her Green Magic / Princess Hippo Stays in Shape / The Leek Twins and the Loch Ness Monster / Miro Cleans the Beach / What a Circus, Archibald! / Miro and Weela's Tricks

episodes.synopsis: Max and Sally take on Wi-Bot the Robot and Boula the Alien and help Lapinou become a cowboy! / Max and Sally take on the Leek twins.
episodes.title: Bunny Wabbit the Cowboy / Bobino at the Beach / Jo Freeze the Magician / Miro's Careless Accidents / Rusty Wi-Bot / Wi-Bot and the Fabulous Playground

episodes.synopsis: Max and Sally take on the Pink Octopus and Gaston and help the Ant Sisters go underwater diving. / Max and Sally take on Broccoli and Jo Glagla.
episodes.title: The Ant Sisters and Red Jack's Treasure / Pink Octopus Plans a Birthday Party / Gaston at the Costume Party / Blue Whale in Egypt / Caramba and the Statuette / Archibald and the Parrots

episodes.synopsis: Max and Sally take on Princess Hippo and Mr. Wolf. / Max and Sally take on Princess Hippo and Lapinou and help Boula the Alien make a film.
episodes.title: Zozo at the Farm / Boula Makes a Movie / Zozo's Giant Hazelnut / Nestor's Triathlon

video.title: Quiz Time
video.synopsis: Host Professor Zack introduces Sally and her brother Max, who compete against a new team every episode to win a big prize.
